name: Echo Station
description:
Story

A lone robot wakes up alone in an abandoned space station. You must explore the station to restore it to its former glory while reassembling yourself along the way.

A metroidvania style platformer made for Godot Wild Jam 53 and my first game made in Godot.

Controls:

Horizontal Movement: A and D or Left and Right

Jump: C or Space

Crouch: S or Down

Drop: Down + Jump

Attack: X or Left Mouse

Interact: F or Enter or Space
